issue.title: add proxy feature to dowload via remote URL
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

the download feature in "diffusion" has three modes :

- "upload" (the file is uploaded by the supplier on the server)
- "URL" (the file remain distant on a remote URL... most of the time, a server of the supplier)
- "zoning" (the file is uploading via a MAP which  offers n URL via a WFS, each URL corresponds to another file for another area).

Problem : with both URL and Zoning, the remote URL is visible. It is OK when the data has a public access scope. But if access scope is "private", the URLs remains accessibles for any one who knows the URL.

Proposition : add a proxy feature to hide remote URLs and secure them (ask for login/password)

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

This proposition can be relatively quickly added to the mode "URL" by adding a PHP proxy with URL rewriting.

This is more tricky with the third mode "zoning" and need some more thoughts.

I suggest to add for no the proxy feature for the mode "URL".

@Bruno, could you change the name of the ticket (I cannot) with "add proxy feature to dowload via remote URL" please ?
